name: tgrpgrp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp))

stmt.origin: tgrpgrplem(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cbs, c0))
stmt.pretty: tgrpgrplem(c0, c1, c2, c3, ((LTrn ` c0)` c1), (+ ` c3), (Base ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(ctgrp, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(ctgrp, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))

body.origin: |- wceq(cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(ctgrp, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(ctgrp, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ HL ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ Grp)
⊣ c2 =(LHyp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =((TGrp ` c0)` c1)
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(ctgrp, c0), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ HL ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ Grp)
⊣ c2 =(LHyp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =((TGrp ` c0)` c1)

comment: The translation group is a group. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2013.)
